comments.body: Will this still compile on Java 6? I don't see any changes to pom.xml or anything to exclude it. Or maybe did you mean to call this by reflection?
comments.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,27 @@
+/*

+ * distributed under the License is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS,
+ * WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied.
+ * See the License for the specific language governing permissions and
+ * limitations under the License.
+ */
+
+package org.apache.spark.util
+
+import java.io.File
+
+/**
+ * Java 7 (or higher) specific util methods.
+ */
+object Java7Util {
+  def isSymlink(file: File) = java.nio.file.Files.isSymbolicLink(file.toPath)
+}
